title.rendered: Press Reports On Nest Digital’s Expansion Plans For 2021

content.rendered:
Press Reports On Nest Digital’s Expansion Plans For 2021

PRINT

AUG 2021

The Kochi-based Nest Group of companies has announced the launch of Nest Digital, marking its formal re-entry into digital engineering services sector with plans to hire over 1000 techies. As part of the expansion plan, NeST Digital will expand its centers in Kochi, Thiruvananthapuram, Bengaluru and Dubai.
